lender.name: Tobin
lender.loan_because: You never know how something small may change the course of events, like the butterfly effect.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to realize their dreams and if my small aid can help someone to do this then I am rewarded in something more valuable than money. The developing world and its people are the future and we should all want to be part of the effort for sustainable, fair, peaceful development that respects all living beings on the planet. I am joined in this venture by my two amazing parents: Trude and John!
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research in computer science.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I am repaying loans to the "Favor Bank."
lender.occupational_info: I teach university courses to students that want to work with children and families.

lender.name: Nirvan
lender.loan_because: I am fortunately in a position to be able to, and Kiva is a way to help those who try to help themselves.

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. I have been blessed with much, this is the least I can do. I feel like I am making a difference in the lives of real people.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently retired from my main career and looking for the next opportunity

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Ron & Maureen
lender.loan_because: We've been fortunate to receive many opportunities in life. We're thrilled that Kiva makes it possible for us to give back, by funding other people around the world who are pursuing a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference as I am able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to kids :)

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is awesome.

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: This is a Revolution in filanthrophy.

lender.name: Namoch
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it simple to help Microentrepreneurs around the world. It is a small bit from me, but as whole this can be a huge impact to thousand of families everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: microenterprise consultant, micro-financing in the United States

lender.name: deb
lender.loan_because: I am excited to have the opportunity to help women get ahead and become self sufficient
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses grow

lender.name: THH
lender.loan_because: My teen daughters and I are doing this together for a few reasons. Most importantly, God has blessed us as individuals, a family, and as a nation, and it is our pleasure to in turn bless someone else. Another reason is that lending via Kiva will help my daughters learn about business. And lastly, we selfishly get a kick out of helping someone out.

lender.name: Mick & Di
lender.loan_because: From little things big things grow.
lender.occupational_info: Mick is a heavy duty mechanic and Di stays home and takes care of things.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference... and help others reach their potential. I feel everyone has the ability to succeed. I hope my contributions will make life easier for those in need.
lender.occupational_info: Purchasing products from other countries is exciting, because I have the opportunity to interact with many cultures. Our world has some countries that are blessed with the ability to produce products and services that are needed in other other countries, thereby allowing everyone to depend on and connect with one another.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: There are so many things in the world that divide us from other, different people. Kiva is a way for me to feel more connected to people who aren't like me at all.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has" Margaret Mead
lender.occupational_info: I help schedule electrical energy into and out of the state of California.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupation: YMCA School Age Care Program Director
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving the power to the individual to change their life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children everyday. The first half of my day is spent in an office, where the second half of the day is spent playing with children after school - I love my job!

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Help companies improve how they run. I love manufacturing.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: We believe in the power of giving less and helping more. We believe giving money away adds to wealth rather than diminishing it. We believe in giving a hand up over a handout. And if not us, then who?
lender.occupational_info:
I'm just a guy who gets up every day excited to continue my life's work: serving others by teaching them the most practical, efficient, and effective ways to live their dreams.
And SMARTSTART is all about sharing our knowledge, our lessons learned, our time and professional guidance, and our hearts with others. In reality, we are all one and there is only now.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: I guess it's the stories I read here. The men and women getting loans are real heroes. They have courage and the vision to make a better life. If I can help them it makes me happy.

lender.name: albert
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a nice place to start
lender.occupational_info: just work with smiles

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: i shall pass through this world but once
lender.occupational_info: electrical building consultant

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It feels good to make a difference.

lender.name: Shortstack
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Cecile
lender.loan_because: I like seeing people help themselves with smaller loans.
lender.occupational_info: retired teacher, free lance writer

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to think that a small loan from an everyday person can help someone on the other side of the world. It also makes you feel great!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a hairstylist in San Francisco, California. I cut women's hair. I've been doing it for over 35 years and still enjoy it.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because:
I love the sense of community that can be achieved on a global basis -
Empowering women is important to me... plus doing this fills my spirit...
lender.occupational_info: I help my company tell our story to help small to medium sized companies achieve higher levels of profitability

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: To promote the foundations of capitalism.
lender.occupational_info: Demonstrate the goodwill of Americans by assisting in the economic growth and development of personal entrepreneurs abroad.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: When I went thru bad financial times my sister was able to help me. Now that I don't need to get help, I like to give help when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a big company that makes machines & equipment for offices. When the equipment is not working correctly someone in that office calls to to say they need a technician to come & fix it. I work in the "call center", with several hundred other people, all of us sitting in rows, answering the phone calls from the entire United States. We get the message out to the repair people.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: microlending is better both for the lender and borrower than hand-outs.
lender.occupational_info: I am a US Navy submarine officer.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: It makes me very happy to help people who want to make a better life for themselves, their community and family. It makes people empowered getting their venture operating, and gives just a little more choice and freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Filmmaking at the moment in New Zealand.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help others out.
lender.occupational_info: I buy/sell stocks, commodities, futures on the financial markets.

lender.name: Rohini
lender.loan_because: Kiva's co-founder, Jessica Flannery, is a friend of mine, and I believe in her vision.
lender.occupational_info: Executive Director of a political advocacy organization

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I have a really clear idea of where the money I send goes and it's going to people that want to support themselves and better their lives through their own hard work.

lender.name: herve & keren
lender.loan_because: economy is the key to peace

lender.name: ARNOLD
lender.occupation: PROVIDING THE LOWEST ENERGY USE IN YOUR HOME
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide clean drinking water for all children and adults in the world. I want to help ashthma suffers and allergy suffers who know no day without the struggle to breathe.
lender.occupational_info: I will set you up in a business by providing you with the goods and literature free of charge to establish your own business that will provide clean drinking water and clean air for the people and places you are aware of that need it.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I've seen micro-loan results
lender.occupational_info: aquatic biologist

lender.name: Paolo
lender.loan_because: through micro-finance I can contribute to level the absurd gap that we have created

lender.name: Marcela
lender.loan_because: it's only fair to share my gains with those who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: Only contributing my part in order to thank God for what he has given me so far.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to help out, it's very easy to do it and I know that it's making a difference for someone.

lender.name: Jan-Ivar
lender.occupational_info: I like to start new companies!

lender.name: Narendra
lender.loan_because: because i think so.. because i think so.. because i think so.. because i think so.. because i think so.. because i think so.. because i think so.. because i think so.. because i think so..
lender.occupational_info: because i think so.. because i think so.. because i think so..

lender.name: Jagjit
lender.loan_because: It provides someone an opportunity to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business providing web application development services. I am a budding social entrepreneur interested in causes in India. My interests are in the healthcare and education sectors.

lender.name: Helle
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping out, especially helping someone to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I teach trade unionist around the world how organize and negotiate fair working conditions and wages - or to "gang up" and "stand up" for their rights

lender.name: diane
lender.loan_because: everyone should be given the opportunity to make there dreams come true and to be independent
lender.occupational_info: paint and wood

lender.name: Byron L. Barksdale
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: medical doctor (pathology)

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky.

lender.name: carlos
lender.loan_because: I am priveleged and consider loans to entrepeneurs as a sustainable method of development.

lender.name: Shaun Q.
lender.loan_because: Making a difference to people you don't know from cultures you don't fully understand in places you'll probably never be expands your world.
lender.occupational_info: As a Project Manager, I remove obstacles from getting things done so people can do the work they do well.

lender.name: Eytan Ginosar
lender.loan_because: It is a blessing to be able to assist people around the world to change there lives.
lender.occupational_info: To touch peoples bodies & souls, to teach people how to change there lives.

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Ngang
lender.loan_because: I am working but my salary is not enough to take care of my 5 younger brothers and sisters so i want to start raring animals for sell which will help me educate my junior ones and also create employment for about 2 people who will be taking care of the animals.
lender.occupational_info: I want to breed chicken, rabbits and guinea pigs which are highly consumed in the local market. These need little income for a start but yield alot of profit when they are sold.

lender.name: Manmohan
lender.loan_because: There is a purpose for everyone's existence on earth, and that purpose is beyond ones own interests.

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: I think with the possibilities of the internet everyone can build bridges between first and third world
lender.occupational_info: I help companies to optimize their business processes by using the internet

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: People should not have to endure the conditions that they do in developing countries. They also work very hard and very long hours to make minimal profit, and we should not take what we have for granted.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a big room with about 300 televisions and I help to make sure all the channels stay looking good

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because:
Hey. I'm Craig. Having been lucky enough to do some volunteer work overseas in a few countries I have seen what a massive difference microloans make. Every loan not only impacts an individual, but their family and community too. At the risk of sounding like an advertorial, I just think Kiva is such a clever initiative.
I once asked a very wise old philanthropist in Sri Lanka, an ex high school teacher who ended up heading a NGO with asssitance in over 10,000 villages, "But there are so many problems in the world. What can one individual do?"
He said, "Something. Anything."
:)

lender.name: Marwa
lender.loan_because: i think we all should be cooperating for a better world and for a better life. Giving a little from what we have may benefit us all..

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: I love it when these people use funds to make money they need and build a better life..

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: it is our obligation in this world to share.
lender.occupational_info: energy healing.

lender.name: Dodi
lender.loan_because: I can bring joy and happiness to people who try to make a living, I can help and they need it...

lender.name: Raymond S. Badarzynski Memorial Fund
lender.loan_because: This fund is in memory of Uncle Ray - a person that stands out in my memory as always willing to lend a helping hand, a smile and a brighter day to anyone in need. It is our hope that others around the world can help achieve their hopes and dreams with a little help from the memory of Uncle Ray. All monies in this account will be donated to stroke research at the closing of this KIVA account - hopefully a few years from now...

lender.name: carolyn
lender.occupational_info: i TAUGHT MULTI HANDICAPPED CHILDREN FROM AGE FOUR TO 21.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help and support women in the world!!!
lender.occupational_info: Language Consulting Swedish, German

lender.name: nid
lender.loan_because: If I don't, who will? I believe people have the ability to make their own luck but they are still confined by the situation into which they are born, we do not get to chose our parents or surroundings and the choices available may be very broad or very slim. Building a better future for yourself and your family is one of the strongest forces we as humanity have to rely upon and it should most certainly be given some help on the way when we can.
lender.occupational_info: Business Intelligence. Which according to some is a contradiction in terms. And who am I to argue with them.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lender.name: fredrick
lender.loan_because: i would like to start a marketing company that will help small enterprises to grow.
lender.occupational_info: my work is good. i have work with landing company and i have done well.

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: That's what we're here for, to help each other out.

lender.name: Carter
lender.loan_because: After college I traveled across many developing countries in Asia and met so many wonderful people who were struggling to improve their lives. I loan because with a few dollars that would normally be just sitting in my bank account, I can give people the hope and opportunity to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I recently returned to the United States after spending a year teaching in China. Currently I work in New York as Financial Real Estate Advisor.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I am able to help in small but important ways those who are trying to make a difference in their lives and the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and restore old wooden boats

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because:
But whoever has this world's goods, and sees his brother in need, and shuts up his heart from him, how does the love of God abide in him? My little children, let us not love in word or in tongue, but in deed and in truth.
~~~~~1st John 3:17+18
lender.occupational_info:
I work full-time doing social media & general office work, for a tree-care company, and part-time as a seller of secondhand books and media on Amazon. I sell vintage homegoods on Etsy, too.
In my "spare" time, I'm a musician, artist and photographer, and you can find my photos on the following website.

lender.name: Kenneth & Lori
lender.loan_because: It is the best way to help and empower people to achieve their goals. Charity demeans a person whereas a loan raises them to new levels.
lender.occupational_info: I manage investments and am an entrepreneur.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful idea. I am glad to give some back and touch others across the world.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: It will change a person or a family
lender.occupational_info: I repair homes for the poor in central appalachia (USA) and in my local community.

lender.name: MollyC
lender.loan_because:
lending is much more sustainable than donating especially in smaller amounts.
teach a man to fish...

lender.name: Codey
lender.loan_because: Mom made me.
lender.occupational_info: Going to school and playing sports and Guitar

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people if you don't have a lot of money.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Nurse in the U.S.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It's a brilliant idea. For a (relatively) small investment, we get the chance to help someone make their life and their community better, how can we lose?

lender.name: Cora
lender.loan_because: We want our family to learn that they can make a positive impact on the lives of others through simple acts.
lender.occupational_info: I like my blanket, playing outside and reading books with mom and dad. I like Winni the Pooh and want to be a sherpa when I grow up.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: It is a good example for my daughter!
lender.occupational_info: Production working many hours for a grocery company and then painting nails and playing with my daughter!

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: It is those little acts of kindness that make the most difference.
lender.occupational_info: Making sure that everyone thinks my client's business is a good one.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe it works and it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: It looks like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the engineering for a small city in Canada.

lender.name: Lynne & Bob
lender.loan_because: It takes such a little to help someone start a business and begin a better life.

lender.name: Pdx Pedicab
lender.occupational_info: Pdx Pedicab operates an eco-friendly pedal powered transportation service in Portland, Oregon in the United States.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping the developing world help themselves out of poverty!
lender.occupational_info: I will be focusing on veterans disability benefits, probate law, estate planning, elder law (medicaid planning), wills and trusts.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: What is not a lot of money to us can make a big difference in some people's lives. It just seems right.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the computers in medical clinics for a big health care company.

lender.name: Ed and Sallie
lender.loan_because: we believe that investing in others and giving back creates opportunities for others that ulitmately benefits us all.
lender.occupational_info: Ed is a real estate broker who sells real estate in North Carolina. Sallie is his partner in their real estate investments.

lender.name: Shellen
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I give large companies ideas on how to sell their products, services and programs to people.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to create sustainable economies in developing countries. Helping people is a plus too...

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because:
http://www.ted.com/talks/hans_rosling_shows_the_best_stats_you_ve_ever_seen.html
http://www.ted.com/talks/hans_rosling_reveals_new_insights_on_poverty.html

lender.name: AFABWorld
lender.loan_because: Helping other people reach their goals is one of our goals.
lender.occupational_info: Our goal is to develop, demonstrate and implement a model ecologically sustainable village that can serve as the template for growth in the developing nations. The United Nations reports that over 1.6 billion people are inadequately housed. Ecologically sustainable villages can provide quality housing, sustainable lifestyles and help reduce the migration of people into already overloaded urban centers.

lender.name: Teena
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money can go very far to help people who want to help themselves work towards a better life. It just seems like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: My husband remodels homes and I do his office work and keep our home and kids together.

lender.name: Filipe W. de Souza
lender.loan_because: most of the things I have, I don't really need.

lender.name: Lia
lender.loan_because: I want women around the world to be able to support themselves economically so that greater gender equality can be achieved.

lender.name: Jasmine
lender.loan_because: I think that I have been very fortunate and it is important to allow other people to have more options and opportunites. This way they can provide a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I do the background work to make people's telephones work. Also prepare tax returns.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: sandra
lender.loan_because: Beeing in a state of giving, enables me to make other happy.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and show them the way to help themselves.

lender.name: leonora
lender.loan_because: homines pro aliis

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I want to remove poverty.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: someone once helped me.

lender.name: HEATHER
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: ITU
lender.loan_because: Porque creo que mi Gobierno no lo hara mejor por m...

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: As a Buddhist I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a big health insurance in Germany. I am the spokesperson (speaker) of this company. I help to prepare and spread information about my company to journalists.

lender.name: Jefferson & Caroline
lender.loan_because: my family is fortunate to be able to share with others, and we would like to help others to create opportunities for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: We work with businesses large and small to market and sell a variety of products that are both useful, as well as entertaining.

lender.name: Tuzuviree
lender.loan_because: I want to printers and photo copier for the organisation.
lender.occupational_info: I do printing, graphic designs and computers solutions. Some times do woodwork solutions too and I really enjoy this.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do - help others.
lender.occupational_info: Organize business meetings around the world.

lender.name: Tamami
lender.loan_because: I enjoy knitting and am willing to help someone who are involved with kntting and other hand craft business.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: For a relatively small amount, you can make a big impact on someone's life
lender.occupational_info: I create computer tools that are useful for others who use computers

lender.name: Radu
lender.loan_because: i like the smile on that happy face
lender.occupational_info: free and without pain...like a nice dream

lender.name: MRSRAWLINGS4THGRADE
lender.occupation: Fourth Grade Social Studies Class: Tammy Rawlings

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: i belive it is good to give.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: the world should be better.
lender.occupational_info: go to school, go home, sleep, wake up next day

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I think it is amazing what people are able to do when they join together. The idea behind Kiva is truly beautiful

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because:
Together we can make a larger impact on the lives of people around the world.
"By Any Dreams Necessary..."
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that provides mentoring and academic assistance to low income students who will be the first in their families to go to university.

lender.name: Otto
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Eradicating poverty and enhancing the basic living conditions. Its a noble responsibility and one thats supports humanity
lender.occupational_info: In a nutshell, I work around the rhelms of information technology.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I have it to give and I want to support people who have a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I help parents who are divorced to work out how their children will spend time with each of them.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I love to assist women through hard times in achieving their best in a manner that also supports their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: The Behlke Consulting vision is to assist in conservation efforts, be a venue for rehabilitating rivers, lakes, waterways, and wildlife habitat through social, environmental, and economic catalytic support systems. Through leveraging sustainability principles, communities and organizations can raise the bar and threshold of various environmental challenges through special technology, six-sigma project execution, and IT recordings.

lender.name: Nate&Lisa
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and our nation and I believe it is a biblical responsibility of every individual to redistribute their wealth to bless and care for the poor. I loan through Kiva because micro-loans are one of the best ways to support those in developing nations by providing them with not only finances, but dignity and skills.
lender.occupational_info: Lisa works to help students learn how to be more successful in agricultural occupations. Nate works to "culturalize" Wyoming people by bringing fine arts to Laramie.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: My Teacher found this site in school and anounced it to the class. He said for us to check it out and read the profiles. I decided to take it to the next level because i thought of how little money to us, could make such a big difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: My wife and I feel this is a great way to share with others. God has helped us, and we believe that God wants us to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure airplanes get assembled and delivered to our customers on-time.

lender.name: Phil K
lender.loan_because: It's a great way of helping others in need to advance their own life in a positive way without the issues of charity.
lender.occupational_info: Im a member of a team that facilitates the inclusive valued daily living of people with intellectually and physically disabilities in their own homes and local community. Other than that I'm a real bastard! Even thou my parents were married at my conception. I'm into my second marriage which is going well. Have three beautiful daughters all doing great. I've learnt enough to know that anything that has come out of a human mind science accepted doesn't do this universe justice. So I consider any current or past religion as an insult to the magnificence of this universe, which makes me a humble atheist. I think so therefore Im an Atheist?

lender.name: Geof Dunn
lender.loan_because: It just makes good sense to help people become self sufficient.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.occupational_info: Engineer -Energy Field

lender.name: haylee
lender.loan_because: i care about people and i love helping others!!!!!
lender.occupational_info: doing chors for my mom

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I believe that given the resources anyone is able to build a better life for themselves, their families, and their communities. Lending money is no different then loaning a neighbor a tool....they will use it constructively and return it.
lender.occupational_info: I spent the majority of my life connecting companies with their customers. As a marketing person it was my responsibility to gain an understanding as to what it was that customers wanted or needed, and then to make sure the company delivered the product or service in a way the customer wanted it and could afford.

lender.name: nicki
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. and i have an interest free loan from the Scholarship Foundation of St. Louis for my education, and this alternative lending was truly was a gift!

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea of people helping other people.

lender.name: Hector
lender.loan_because: With a little help, anybody can accomplish anything!
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that food products that my company produces are safe to eat.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to score points on that Big Tote-Board in the Sky! On a more serious note, I think it would be very hard to find a better way to maximize your giving dollars, or to share the good fortune of being a U.S. citizen.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Work with global companies to help them meet their global goals

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: i would want someone to give me the same chance to maintain or expand my business.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school full time and I study Sociology and African American studies. It comes down to interactions+race and ethnicity

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: I desired to improve other people's life environment.

lender.name: Jean & Thomas
lender.loan_because: it is our privilege and duty to share what we have been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science and hope my students love learning. Thomas is in a period of life where he's been working different jobs seeking out what his true calling in life is.

lender.name: Wylene
lender.loan_because: It puts a smile in my heart and on my face to see these people strive for success and attain it! May God Bless you many times.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I am only one person but I do what I can to make the world a better place. I am paying forward the generosity that was bestowed on me when I was a struggling single mother.
lender.occupational_info: I help people save and invest for their retirement.

lender.name: Abril
lender.loan_because: it produces good vibrations.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in women's lives where they are historically underrepresented in their local economies.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Realtor in New Orleans, Louisiana.

lender.name: Jerry M
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves. I am happy to be able to help someone move forward with a new opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the IT Administration & Support field, maintaining computer networks, workstations, and related technology.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I know the feeling of having a dream but not being able to fulfil it because of an obstacle that is not in our control. If I can help eliminate that obstacle, it'll make my day.
lender.occupational_info: Brings me around the world, meeting various people. But it also leads me away from my family and my loved ones.

lender.name: Frank Lloyd Kramer
lender.loan_because: Supporting developing businesses is my profession
lender.occupational_info: Private venture capitalist

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to empower others, have a direct impact in someones life and see the wonderful results!

lender.name: Prath
lender.loan_because: I want to help those with a desire to succeed a chance to fullfill their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at a university studying finance.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student, studying towards a business degree

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I'm raising my son and living life as an adventure.

lender.name: Cue
lender.loan_because: As an American i am more fortunate that most of the worlds people. I find a sense of purpose in some small way in being able to help those who struggle just to exist. Even though my loans are small I will nonetheless continue to recycle the repaid loans so that others may continue to improve their lives.

lender.name: Sondra
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing program that not only helps people, but empowers them.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me to be a blessing to others. This is a great way to make a little difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I equip college students to be leaders and difference-makers wherever their lives take them.

lender.name: I.K.
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I like encouraging human determination and creating positive mutual feelings.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a diverse environment which is challenging both intellectually and a test of patience.

lender.name: roni
lender.loan_because: I want to give people hope so they may have peace in their hearts and faith in humanity. It is our nature to care for our families, communities & specially the children they are the future.
lender.occupational_info: I sell flowers, I study medicine and help people stay healthy and get better.

lender.name: Yolie
lender.loan_because: Extrordinary kindnesses have been bestowed upon me by friends, family and aquaintances and this is one small way of continuing those kindnesses to others.
lender.occupational_info: Specialize in Deep Tissue and Trigger Point Therapy by Massage Therapy. I also provide Professional Chair Massage at Special Events and at Corporate offices to help relieve built up stress and enhance / build their Wellness Programs. I find it an honor to assist folks who seek me out in pain relief and help them toward restorative health.

lender.name: Lloyd Record
lender.loan_because: This is a simple small way individuals can do something to make a big diference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer

lender.name: Idan Agmon
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do to share some of your money with others.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I had to work hard to gain capital to start my own small business and I respect and value the work these folks have put into their own businesses. I am happy to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student in Colorado. I am in my last year studying zoology (the science of animals). I also volunteer at the Centers for Disease Control and work in a laboratory to end Dengue Fever. Within my small business, I make different things from leather.

lender.name: yotam
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: i just a kid.but i do it with my parents.we believ in your business. and we believ on you.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: Life has been very good to me and I want to share the opportunity of a better life with others.

lender.name: Kurtis
lender.loan_because: Helping someone help themself is the only way to make a real difference. Not everyone has been dealt the same hand those of us in the developed world have. Giving somebody something for nothing doesn't really help them improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I help foreign companies sell their securities (stocks and bonds) to US investors.

lender.name: Gautam
lender.loan_because:
If it is within my means to provide resources that can be leveraged by someone to do something productive then both parties should strive to accomplish something great.
Also I'm fascinated by the scale and ease with which this is possible through Kiva.
3 cheers for capitalism! 3 cheers for Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: Designing quality web media experiences.

lender.name: Hanny
lender.loan_because: I want to do something useful to make other people lives better.
lender.occupational_info: Interior designer

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I have seen the results, and they're awesome!
lender.occupational_info: I wanted to change the world but I couldn't get a babysitter, so I brought my children with me!

lender.name: Tally
lender.loan_because: I believe
lender.occupational_info: I work for Celebrity Cruises with the Childrens Programs

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone better themself.
lender.occupational_info: I help contractors market themselves online to potential customers. I am also going for my BA @ Colorado Film School and I Dj in my spare time.

lender.name: Walt
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps volunteer in the credit union movement in South America.....I KNOW how it helps and motivates people to be small capitalists.....most will NEVER have any assistance at all......you gotta lend a little.....this is NOT a donation....a helping hand......

lender.name: Marianne
lender.occupational_info: Creating Software

lender.name: Sheila E.
lender.loan_because: I can. We all can and we should. I don't have much, but I can share what I have...and that's a good thing!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently retired but do volunteer work when I am physically able. I also donate hand-made rosaries to various Christian organizations.

lender.name: Misbah
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with more than I need. What good is a blessing if you can't use it to help someone?

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I believe each person should have a chance to live in their bliss. When they are uneducated and hungry that is nearly impossible.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell interesting vintage and antique items. I like to think of it as recycling !!

lender.name: karma
lender.occupation: participants in the courthouse seva program

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer programmer.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I think it is a fantastic way to help someone or a group of people in particular. The involvement of both loaner and receiver in the project is what I admire. I am blessed that I am able to give someone an opportunity in his or her live to overcome poverty and become successful.

lender.name: Liane
lender.loan_because: I can and it is good business practice.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in the sciences with their careers.

lender.name: J. Kane
lender.loan_because: Inspiring stories and a desire to help people

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I believe in people

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I hope to give others the chance to not only to make a living but to also fulfill a dream. "To whom much is given, much is expected"
lender.occupational_info: I look for opportunities for each individual to find joy in everyday living.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: of my commitment to social justice

lender.name: Thomas & Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It feels so good...
lender.occupational_info: I sell financial software to lending institutions and my wife is a buyer for an online organic grocery store that delivers.

lender.name: yev
lender.occupational_info: working for medical commerce company

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help people from other parts of the world achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Healthcare Sales Professional.

lender.loan_because: People need loans.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: sharing is an important value

lender.name: Monica, Tony & Dom
lender.loan_because: There's no reason not to.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much --

lender.name: VMES Grade Five
lender.loan_because: We hope to help other children around the world

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: the stories are very touching

lender.name: Orion
lender.occupational_info: Awesome!!!

lender.name: ama
lender.loan_because: I had a bit of money remaining from Christmas presents. Rather than putting it in my wallet, where it would end up spent on something of little lasting consequence, I decided I wanted to contribute to trying to help others achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: i am a freelance photographer and artist with narcolepsy

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can. This is an example of how the Internet can be great.
lender.occupational_info: I work to apply information technology in the effort to find new medicines

lender.name: Cledwyn
lender.loan_because: the future of the world is in empowering individuals to improve their own lives.

lender.name: keating
lender.loan_because: I believe when you help level the economic playing field the world benefits.
lender.occupational_info: I sell real estate and make a commission when the trade happens. I also teach sailing which is a lot of fun.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: Microlending is the most democratic way to empower others.
lender.occupational_info: I educate others to feel connected to the earth and to be part of the solution.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is very effective in the fight against poverty.

lender.name: MoboVivo Inc.
lender.loan_because: Our company, partners and customers choose to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Licence and distribute TV shows for sale over the Internet and on mobile telephones. All GreenTV purchases from mobovivo.com/store/channels/greentv go to support kiva entrepreneurs

lender.name: T & B
lender.loan_because: "Simple kindness may be the most vital key to the riddle of how human beings can live with each other in peace, and care properly for this planet we all share" ~ Bo Lozoff

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I donate to Kiva because I know it's an easy and effective way in which I can share my good fortune with the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at boarding school in the north east of America. The school emphasizes service, but because I'm so busy at school I don't have much time to travel or partake in community service. Thanks to Kiva though, I can easily make a difference right from school.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with an opportunity to do so and because I want to teach my son to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student majoring in Social Work as well as a single parent and an administrative assistant for a non-profit organization that works with teens.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Stevia is both the cure for the human body, as well as cold fission. Stevia blended in water splits it apart into a natural gas, then cycles back to water underneath once hidden toxins that float for easy removal.
lender.occupational_info: Stevia blends toxic soap out of water, creating what I call pure h2o. Pure h2o has made my body run faster than most black pro athletes in American football, and lean and ripped with little to no fat on my body.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help small businesses grow and hopefully prosper with very little downside exposure on my part.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower others to better off their lives and encourage them to develop their self worth.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse in the Emergency Room

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Helping people achieve their dreams as others helped me is a great way to pay forward the faith others placed in me.
lender.occupational_info: I currently photograph nature and landscapes. Recently retired, I now have time to do the photography I enjoy most.

lender.name: Jim & Joyce
lender.loan_because: Imagine how different the world would be if every person helped someone else.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I've had to borrow money to get by and get where I am today

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's vitally important to share our global community's good fortune to help improve the living and working standards of the developing world
lender.occupational_info: Private practice cardiovascular disease specialist

lender.name: Hui-Ling
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving and sharing. If we can all pay it forward from whatever we have received and shared from others' generosity, we can form a circle of compassnate sharing with all beings.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I chose Fanny bevause I love purses!

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I can see the direct benefits!
lender.occupational_info: University student

lender.name: Tilak
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in too many ways not to try and be of service.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician-in-training.

lender.name: Jarilyn
lender.loan_because: I strive to "be the change <I> want to see in the world". I hate injustice and poverty and believe that microfinancing is a good way to give people the shot at the quality of life they deserve. I have been blessed and am thankful for the opportunity to help bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an architectural firm that focuses on designing and creating buildings that are good for the environment!

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: The best way to empower people is to provide the resources to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money to fund educational programs.

lender.name: Felix
lender.loan_because: I know that the value of my money is much greater in the hands of these entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Swedish 18-year-old living and studying in Brazil. In late March of 2008, in my Economics class here in High School, we started reading about microfinance, and we visited Kiva.org. I thought it seemed to be a good movement to be a part of, benefiting the entrepreneurs with, for us, minimal means, so here I am!

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I can help. It takes just a little to make a big difference for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a university coordinating and delivering medical programs

lender.name: Yaacov
lender.loan_because: I want to support this idea of Kiva, and spred it more and more
lender.occupational_info: Work with people to fulfill themselves, to acheive and find their aim in life. A coach for wholeness and wellness

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I know I can't save the world. ..but if I can give even one family the opportunity to food , shelter, and (most important) self -respect...what can be more meaningful than that? Please join me. ..

lender.name: Pamela&Rudolph
lender.loan_because: We believe in microfinance and microlending! It's a responsible way to help people, help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Dedicated to learning about all cultures & people of our world and contributing, in some small way, to the good of humanity.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I believe these are hard working and devoted people. They deserve to have happy and successful lives. Kiva helps me appreciate those who have to work much harder in order to make a decent living. These people possess a strong will and take nothing in life for granted, which to me, is inspiring.
lender.occupational_info: I teach French in a public school to children ages 9-14yrs. It is a fun, challenging, and rewarding position. I've learned that even though I'm the teacher, my students teach me something every day!

lender.name: Saad
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Mason Family
lender.loan_because: we can
lender.occupational_info: we provide healthcare to the poor and elderly.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to make the world a better place for all.
lender.occupational_info: I am still an Okie but I currently live in Saudi Arabia working at King Faisal Specialist Hospital in a medical ICU. I am hoping to do a lot of traveling while here!

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I support grassroots efforts!
lender.occupational_info: Working to end poverty

lender.name: arthur
lender.loan_because: i worked in Africa for 5.5 years.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: kindness is contagious.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I want to give other hardworking souls the chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I decide what products my employer should sell to electric utilities.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way for me to contribute to those who wish to support and better themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office that provides financial help towards the poorest's housing costs.

lender.name: Jocel
lender.loan_because: because we all have a responsibility to leave the world a little better than we found it.

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: everything counts. Giving back and giving a hand up has an enormous and lasting effect in this world. If we turn our backs, if we say it's not up to us...Then who?
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help businesses become more profitable and successful. I am also a writer.

lender.name: Bailey
lender.loan_because: I think everybody should have money to pay for things they need

lender.name: Dave & Sara
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is the way forward - it works!

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference

lender.name: Cameo
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to live with dignity, good health, and hope.
lender.occupational_info: I sell beekeeping supplies and honey in San Francisco, California.

lender.name: Michal
lender.loan_because: We would like to help people, empower them to become independent and successful.
lender.occupational_info: We carry a message of well being, personal development and empowerment to thousands of people around the world. We want to free people to have big dreams and fulfill them.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I really want to help others and even though I can't give out too much being a student, it's amazing that I can still impact someone's life so much!
lender.occupational_info: I major in international studies focusing on international development.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: It's a very easy way to help someone improve the quality of their life.
lender.occupational_info: I advise financial advisors which of our investment strategies best meet the needs of their clients.

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: There are so many people around the world who are in need of support & if everyone does a little then we can make a difference. Also because I can!
lender.occupational_info: Self employed investor.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: "It is the greatest of all mistakes to do nothing because you can only do a little." Sydney Smith
lender.occupational_info: I install electrical wiring and equipment in new construction or remodels of existing buildings.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: I don't have much to give so when I do I want it to mean something. I hope my small donation can help change the world one person at a time. The benefit of the financing help people help themselves .
lender.occupational_info: I am a Bartender at a Resort Hotel so I work for tips and I work hard for my money.

lender.name: Logan
lender.loan_because: i can see a difference made in not only one persons life but through many more people through the person i loan to
lender.occupational_info: I was all sorts of cars from the inside out

lender.name: Freddy
lender.loan_because: I want to help out others in need. We are all part of Planet Earth and need to help each other!
lender.occupational_info: I worked for Delta Air Lines as a Customer Service Supervisor on the ground - ticketing, gates & lost luggage. They are a great airline to work for and have been great to me since being disabled.

lender.name: Roberto
lender.loan_because: I was given a certificate as a gift and felt good about passing good karma along!!!
lender.occupational_info: Retail sales

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I can finally afford to.
lender.occupational_info: I manufacture and sell clean bottled water to homes and offices.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I believe in Karma. Also it feels good to know in some tiny way you may have changed someone's life completely.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a busy hospital in Brisbane

lender.name: M,N,A & G
lender.loan_because: We believe in sustainability (individuals and cultures), education and literacy, and the sharing of food and conversation world-wide.

lender.name: Loretta
lender.loan_because: a little goes a long way.

lender.name: Jodie
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help large health care companies with internal projects.

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: I never thought a mere $25.00 could make a difference in someone's life. I this case 25 bucks can buy half a goat...the wonder of it all. I'm hooked!
lender.occupational_info: I make maps

lender.name: KatnDew
lender.loan_because: because I am so grateful for all I have. It is the least I can do to help someone who is willing to work to help themselves.

lender.name: Ed & Yvonne
lender.loan_because: it's more effective than giving

lender.occupational_info: I'm trying to do the best for myself and for the world every day. Till now I think it works.

lender.loan_because: I want to help others

lender.loan_because: I want to help and be of assistance to he entrepreneurs here. I want to be a Kiva Fellow as well.

lender.name: Antonio Villamayor
lender.loan_because: Necesito un poco de dinero para formar mi propio negocio de venta de calzados, para poder dar de comer didnamente a mi familia
lender.occupational_info: Yo adoro mi trabajo porque me relaciono con las personas, ser vendedor en mi opinion requiere de mucho relacionamiento humano,tenes que saber los gustos de los clientesy eso se hace dialogando con ellos ,hasta conocer sus gustos y sus tendencias.
